Source code for nnlibs.meta.train

# EpyNN/nnlibs/meta/train.py



[docs]def model_training(model):
    """.
    """
    for model.e in range(model.epochs):

        for batch in model.embedding.batch_dtrain:

            A = X = batch.X

            A = model.forward(A)

            dA = dX = A - batch.Y.T

            dA = model.backward(dA)

        model.compute_metrics()

        model.evaluate()

        model.logs()

    return None
